description: A classic strawberry ice-cream that is so simple enough to make and even more simple to enjoy.
name: Simple Strawberry Ice-Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl whip the cream until soft peaks form and leave to one side. In a separate bowl, combine the condensed milk with the vanilla extract and chopped strawberries.
Now fold both bowls together into a sealable container suitable for freezing. Place in the freezer until hard enough to serve which should take over 3 hours.
